The user throws a lighter on the ground in front of his opponent and expands the flame into a wall of fire. It is noted to be a technique that "makes a small spark burst into a pillar of fire".<ref name="KS:SNS">''Konoha Shinden: Steam Ninja Scrolls''</ref>
